tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grant_projects (
   project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   grant_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name STRING,
  project_description STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Milestones (
  milestone_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  milestone_description STRING,
  milestone_date DATE,
  milestone_status STRING,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  grant_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE milestones (
  milestone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  milestone_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  completion_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE GrantProjects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  grant_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Milestones (
  milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  milestone_name VARCHAR(255),
  completion_date DATE,
  milestone_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE Project (project_id INT, project_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(10, 2), PRIMARY KEY(project_id))

CREATE TABLE Milestone (milestone_id INT, project_id INT, milestone_name VARCHAR(255), milestone_date DATE, status VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY(milestone_id), FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id))

CREATE TABLE Task (task_id INT, project_id INT, task_name VARCHAR(255), task_description TEXT, assigned_to VARCHAR(100), deadline DATE, status VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY(task_id), FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id))
CREATE TABLE Team (team_id INT, team_name VARCHAR(255), team_lead VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY(team_id))
CREATE TABLE Team_Member (team_id INT, member_id INT, member_name VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY(team_id, member_id), FOREIGN KEY(team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id))
